EmailTemplate.name: CiscoLive EMEA 1/28/19.001 CiscoLive EMEA - Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: See you in Barcelona?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
With Cisco Live coming up January 28 – February 1, 2019, I am reaching out to see if you plan on attending this year. I'd like to invite you to an exclusive one-on-one meeting with our executive team during the event. Turbonomic executive attendees will include:
- Ben Nye, CEO - Ben has more than 20 years of experience as a senior business leader in the enterprise software space, having previously held senior positions at VERITAS and Precise. He is also co-managing partner at Bain Capital Ventures. - Shmuel Kliger, President and Founder - Shmuel directs the technology teams encompassing development, product strategy and management, customer success and customer support and is also an Ernst and Young Entrepreneur of the Year finalist.
Book a Meeting <[[https://turbonomic.jifflenow.com/ciscolive2019/external_request/733811]]>
At Cisco Live, we look forward to the opportunity to connect with you to discuss your digital transformation strategy and the challenges your IT organization might be facing. Turbonomic is a real-time decision engine which instantly scales infrastructure resources up or down, in response to changes in workload demand. It proactively does this, before service levels are affected, thereby preventing issues from occurring in the first place.
Please click here <[[https://turbonomic.jifflenow.com/ciscolive2019/external_request/733811]]> to schedule a meeting and I will send a calendar invitation.
Alternatively, you are welcome to join us at our stand (#G13) to see these latest advancements in our platform.
I hope to see you in Barcelona!
Best, Kristen
